title: Special domestic LP gas distribution in several areas today
body_lines: There will be a special distribution of domestic LP gas (12.5 kg, 5kg & 2.3kg) today in Colombo, Kalutara & Gampaha areas, says the Litro Gas Lanka Limited.
The list of dealers and the availability of the number of stocks is updated on the official website of the country’s primary liquefied petroleum gas supplier: www.litrogas.com
